languages.text: {n}Цепкий взгляд, безупречно ровная спина и умение держать лицо — на секунду кажется, что перед вами молодой Абеляр, а не его наследница. Судя по шрамам на неприкрытых частях тела, Клеменции довелось участвовать в сражениях, прежде чем занять пост канцлера.{/n}

{n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Цепкий взгляд, безупречно ровная спина и умение держать лицо — на секунду кажется, что перед вами молодой Абеляр, а не его наследница. Судя по шрамам на неприкрытых частях тела, Клеменции довелось участвовать в сражениях, прежде чем занять пост канцлера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia had seen her share of fights prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

{n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅目光犀利，背影挺拔，沉着冷静。有那么一瞬间，你感觉你面前的人仿佛并不是阿贝拉德的后代，而是他年轻时的样子。从她身体暴露在外的皮肤上的伤痕来看，克莱门缇雅在担任宰相一职之前，经历过相当多的战斗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅目光犀利，背影挺拔，沉着冷静。有那么一瞬间，你感觉你面前的人仿佛并不是阿贝拉德的后代，而是他年轻时的样子。从她身体暴露在外的皮肤上的伤痕来看，克莱门缇雅在担任宰相一职之前，经历过相当多的战斗。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su mirada penetrante, su espalda recta, su compostura... por un momento, parece que estés mirando a una versión más joven de Abelard y no a su heredera. A juzgar por las cicatrices en las partes visibles de su cuerpo, Clementia participó en numerosos combates antes de ocupar el cargo de canciller.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su mirada penetrante, su espalda recta, su compostura... por un momento, parece que estés mirando a una versión más joven de Abelard y no a su heredera. A juzgar por las cicatrices en las partes visibles de su cuerpo, Clementia participó en numerosos combates antes de ocupar el cargo de canciller.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鋭いまなざし、隙のない真っすぐな姿勢、冷静さ。一瞬だけ、アベラルドの跡継ぎではなく若い頃の彼を見ているような感覚に陥る。身体の露出している部分に見える傷から察するに、クレメンティアは議長の座に就任する前にある程度の戦闘を経験してきたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鋭いまなざし、隙のない真っすぐな姿勢、冷静さ。一瞬だけ、アベラルドの跡継ぎではなく若い頃の彼を見ているような感覚に陥る。身体の露出している部分に見える傷から察するに、クレメンティアは議長の座に就任する前にある程度の戦闘を経験してきたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der prüfende Blick, der völlig gerade Rücken, die Gelassenheit – für einen Moment hast du das Gefühl, du hättest eine jüngere Version von Abelard selbst vor dir, nicht seine Erbin. Den Narben auf den entblößten Stellen ihres Körpers nach zu urteilen, hat Clementia vor ihrer Position als Kanzlerin auch divers Kämpfe bestritten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der prüfende Blick, der völlig gerade Rücken, die Gelassenheit – für einen Moment hast du das Gefühl, du hättest eine jüngere Version von Abelard selbst vor dir, nicht seine Erbin. Den Narben auf den entblößten Stellen ihres Körpers nach zu urteilen, hat Clementia vor ihrer Position als Kanzlerin auch divers Kämpfe bestritten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce regard perçant, cette posture presque militaire, ce sang-froid... Pendant un court instant, vous avez l'impression de regarder une version plus jeune d'Abélard lui-même, et non son héritière. À en juger par les nombreuses cicatrices qui couvrent les parties visibles de son corps, Clémentia a participé à de nombreux combats avant de devenir chancelière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce regard perçant, cette posture presque militaire, ce sang-froid... Pendant un court instant, vous avez l'impression de regarder une version plus jeune d'Abélard lui-même, et non son héritière. À en juger par les nombreuses cicatrices qui couvrent les parties visibles de son corps, Clémentia a participé à de nombreux combats avant de devenir chancelière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keskin bakışları, kusursuzca dimdik duruşu ve soğukkanlılığını görünce bir an karşında Abelard'ın vârisi değil de gençliğinin ta kendisi varmış gibi hissediyorsun. Clementia'nın vücudunun görebildiğin kısımlarındaki yara izleri, şansölyelik makamına atanmadan önce savaştan nasibini aldığını gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sharp gaze, the impeccably straight back, the composure — for a moment, you feel like you're looking at a younger version of Abelard himself, not his heir. Judging by the scars on the exposed parts of her body, Clementia saw her fair share of combat prior to assuming the position of chancellor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Keskin bakışları, kusursuzca dimdik duruşu ve soğukkanlılığını görünce, bir an karşında Abelard'ın vârisi değil de, gençliğinin ta kendisi varmış gibi hissediyorsun. Clementia'nın vücudunun görebildiğin kısımlarındaki yara izlerine bakılacak olursa, şansölye makamına atanmadan önce gereğince savaş yüzü görmüş.{/n}
